= Components =

|| *Component Code* || *Component Name* || *Function* || *Comments* ||
|| PFA.TGS || Sensory Trigeminal Nerve Nuclei || Discriminative sensation and light touch of face, conscious proprioception || Pontine Nuclei, part of cranial nerve nuclei ||
|| PFA.VN || Vestibular Nucleus || Equilibrium || Pons ||
|| PFA.IO || Inferior Olivary Nucleus || Proprioception Relay from Spinal Cord to Cerebellum || ||
|| PFA.VN || Lateral Vestibular Nucleus || Postural Reflexes || ||
|| PFA.PPN || Pedunculopontine Nucleus || Providing sensory feedback to the cerebral cortex || ||
|| PFA.PBN || Parabrachial Nucleus || Source of short-latency nociceptive input || ||
